alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 11:03PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Haakon, Ziebach, northeastern Meade and southeastern Perkins Counties through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1103 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Maurine to 6 miles northwest of Red Scaffold to 2 miles east of Billsburg. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dupree, Faith, Cherry Creek, Milesville, Meadow, Chance, Maurine, Usta, Glad Valley, South Eagle Butte, Red Scaffold, Billsburg, Thunder Butte, Red Elm, Iron Lightning, Takini, Durkee Lake and Arrow Head Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
